p: A syndromic approach was adopted for diagnostics. Therefore, blood ( n = 398) and nasopharyngeal swab ( n = 113) samples were collected and analysed using a multiplex strategy for the detection of Plasmodium genus, arboviruses (including main flavivirus species, chikungunya and Rift Valley fever virus), Salmonella genus and respiratory viruses (such as influenza, respiratory syncytial virus and human metapneumovirus).
